original_text: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
korean_text: 우리는 낮에 속하였으니 정신을 차리고 믿음과 사랑의 호심경을 붙이고 구원의 소망의 투구를 쓰자

sentences.original_text: But let us, who are of the day,
putting on the breastplate of faith and love;
and for a helmet, the hope of salvation.
